verses.roman:
eta bhāvi' kahe--śuna, nimāñi paṇḍita
tava vyākhyā śuni' āmi ha-ilāṅ vismita

synonyms: eta bhāvi—thinking like this; kahe—the paṇḍita says; śuna—hear; nimāñi paṇḍita—O Nimāi Paṇḍita; tava—Your; vyākhyā—explanations; śuni'-hearing; āmi—I; ha-ilāṅ—have become; vismita—struck with wonder.
translation: Thinking thus, the paṇḍita said, "My dear Nimāi Paṇḍita, please hear me. Hearing Your explanation, I am simply struck with wonder.
